ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ; whole fat greek yogurt ; (285 g)
1 cup ; self-rising flour, plus more for dusting

steps.step: In a bowl mix together yogurt and 1 cup flour (125 g) until it forms a smooth dough.
Transfer dough to a floured surface. Divide into four equal parts.
Roll out each section of dough to about 8 inches (20 cm) in diameter using plenty of flour to prevent sticking or tearing.
Cook the bread in a dry hot pan set over medium high heat. Cook each side for 2-4 minutes until golden brown and cooked through.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl mix together yogurt and 1 cup flour (125 g) until it forms a smooth dough.
Transfer dough to a floured surface.
Roll out each section of dough to about 8 inches (20 cm) in diameter using plenty of flour to prevent sticking or tearing.
Cook the bread in a dry hot pan set over medium high heat.
Cook each side for 2-4 minutes until golden brown and cooked through.
